27FCB7D0.Line7.6D03F: To stop Lilith! And damn the cost. Inarius is mad with pride. We can’t rely on him.

3D1B9D01.Line17.7FA05: You bested Astaroth and Andariel both. If we can’t find that stone, you might be our next best weapon.

6F2B10C2.Line11.6DE47: Stone or no, there is someone who might stand a chance against Lilith.

F427C5EC.Line3.7FA05: How can you say this changes nothing? Our one potential ally just ran off with our one weapon. What’s your plan now?
